name: Hawkins Scoops Ahoy
description: Ice cream parlor run by Steve and Robin. Secret base of operations... sometimes.

name: The Palace Arcade
description: The hottest hangout spot in Hawkins. Play Dragonâ€™s Lair, Dig Dug, and maybe catch a glimpse of Mad Max setting a new high score.

name: Hawkins Middle School
description: AV Club meets after school, but beware the flickering lights and strange noises in the halls.

name: Murray's Investigations
description: Independent investigative services. Fluent in Russian.

name: Starcourt Mall
description: Shop 'til you drop at Hawkins' favorite mall! Featuring Scoops Ahoy, RadioShack, and... something strange in the lower levels.

name: Surfer Boy Pizza
description: Pineapple on pizza is gnarly you say... Well I say, "try before you deny!"

name: Hawkins Lab
description: Top-secret government facility. Not open to the public. Experiments may be ongoing.
